thread.title: John Wall celebrated Bradley Beal's 3-pointer before ball even left his hands
thread.title_full: John Wall celebrated Bradley Beal's 3-pointer before ball even left his hands

author: Whitney Medworth
title: John Wall celebrated Bradley Beal's 3-pointer before ball even left his hands
text:
The NBAâ€™s latest celebration hits Washington
John Wall took a page out of the Warriors playbook on Wednesday night and celebrated this Bradley Beal three-pointer before the ball even left his hands.
Considering the Wizards were shooting around 20 percent from the three-point line at the time of the shot, the confidence from Wall was pretty impressive. That said, a couple of trips later down the floor Bradley Beal tried to return the celebration favor to Bojan Bogdanovic. Bogdanovic absolutely missed leaving Beal with his hands in the air for no reason.
